arts.ttl: Crystal Palace make cheeky dig at Liverpool amid Marc Guehi transfer saga
arts.sum: Liverpool travel to London to take on Crystal Palace on Saturday afternoon in the Premier League, with the Reds looking to maintain their 100 percent record in the top flight

arts.ttl: Marc Guehi's stance on Liverpool transfer saga with Crystal Palace decision on the horizon
arts.sum: Marc Guehi was on the verge of a deadline day move to Liverpool, only for Crystal Palace to pull the plug at the last minute, but the England centre-back's future remains uncertain

arts.ttl: Liverpool XI vs Crystal Palace – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Reigning champions Liverpool travel to Selhurst Park on Saturday, aiming to continue their perfect start to the Premier League season. Arne Slot’s side have won all five of their opening games. A sixth consecutive victory would see them equal the best-ever start by a defending champion, previously set by Chelsea and Manchester City. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: The Premier League’s last remaining unbeaten teams clash at Selhurst Park on Saturday as Crystal Palace host reigning champions Liverpool. The Reds have made a perfect start to the season with five wins from five under new manager Arne Slot. They face a formidable test, however, against an Eagles side on a remarkable 17-match unbeaten […] The post Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace welcome Liverpool to Selhurst Park on Saturday for a top-of-the-table clash where they will be looking to make history. Oliver Glasner’s side are currently on a 17-match unbeaten run across all competitions. Avoiding defeat against the reigning champions would see them equal their all-time club record of 18 matches without a loss. arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner reflects on Crystal Palace’s ‘development over months’ before welcoming league leaders Liverpool
arts.sum: “We know we are able to create chances and to score goals, and when you have this proven over many months, this gives confidence to the team. For that reason, performances and pride mean more to him than records and he hailed the “development over months” that has solidified their structure.

arts.ttl: Glasner confirms double Palace attacking injury boost before Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner has provided a promising update on the fitness of attacking duo Ismaila Sarr and Yeremy Pino ahead of Saturday’s clash with Premier League champions Liverpool at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Toughest test yet? Liverpool take on Oliver Glasner's formidable Crystal Palace
arts.sum: On Saturday Liverpool will face perhaps their toughest test of the season to date, when they make the trip to London to take on Crystal Palace. Although the Selhurst Park side only finished 12th in...

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Carabao Cup action and Ross Kilvington provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.
